title: Did Trump use a metaphorical drawing of the concrete wall during a speech that began in 2004?
subtitle: Donald Trump in 2004: "If there is a concrete wall in front of you, cross it, cross it, and turn it. But go to the other side of that wall."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: President Trump used the metaphor of a "shake wall" during a speech that began in 2004.
